name: ThatVision
description:
Join the discord Server for updates! - the server is still in development

Here: https://discord.gg/JAGMMYu - Link please work :D

ThatVision is a creepy adventure game that takes place in an abandoned factory, filled with conspiracy theories and secrets. As players explore the dilapidated factory, they will uncover the secrets of the factory and its dark past, learning about the conspiracies and tragedies that led to its abandonment.

Throughout the game, players will encounter a variety of strange and unsettling occurrences, hinting at a larger, more sinister force at work in the factory. It becomes clear that the players are not alone, and they must use their wits and cunning to uncover the truth about the factory.

As they progress through the game, players will come across clues and artifacts that will help them piece together the mystery of what happened in the factory. With its immersive atmosphere and chilling storytelling, ThatVision is sure to keep players on the edge of their seats as they unravel the mysteries of the abandoned factory.
